Title: Relates to termination of parental rights in cases of a child conceived through rape
Summary: Provides a process for the termination of parental rights in cases of a child conceived through rape by clear and convincing evidence.
LawCode: Amd §§111-a & 240, Dom Rel L; amd §130.92, Pen L; add Art 6 Part 6 §§681 & 682, Fam Ct Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, the domestic relations law and the family court act, in relation to termination of parental rights in cases of a child conceived through rape
